infos.value: This looks like Leonis Castle.
My, my... It's colossal.
So, where is this handsome prince supposed to be?
Hahaha. Prince Sterne has duties to the crown. I don't think he'd be whiling away his time here.
Rightly said. Ahahaha.
Who are you two?
(Hey, Yerma... She doesn't sound very friendly...)
(I know this type of person... Just because they're in a bad mood, it doesn't mean they have to take it out on us!)
...I can hear you.
Ahahaha. My apologies.
I'm Lilyth. Forgive me, but things are very hectic at the moment.
Fennes's mangy soldiers have started poking their noses around at the border. I'm quite pressed dealing with them.
What's a "Fennes"?
You're telling me you don't know...?
Fennes is the country neighboring Leonis to the northeast.
It's full of savages being led around by a monster of a man named Muraga.
They come raging into Leonis's territory time and time again.
Hm... Sounds like a pain.
Anyway, state your purpose. And be quick about it, please.
I'm Etre. This is Yerma.
We came to enlist in «Fortem».
You came to... Did you just say «Fortem»!?
(W-wait, Yerma! That was awfully sudden...)
(It's fine. Besides, how else are we going to meet with this Prince Sterne?)
You're after Prince Sterne, are you?
For someone who likes whispering, you don't seem to mind being overheard.
Call it a specialty of us common folk.
So... Will you accept us into «Fortem»?
Just three days ago, there was another who wanted to join «Fortem».
If I'm not mistaken...she was a paladin.
With nothing to lose, I gave her the enlistment exam and ordered her to clear out that nearby cave full of skeletons.
She hasn't come back since—she's probably been eaten up. Ahahaha!
U-uh...
So, what will it be for you two?
Vanquish the skeletons in that cave? Or run on home with your tails between your legs?
Yerma...
Skeletons, you say?
What an easy victory this will be!
...Oh-ho. You seem determined.
Of course. Come, Etre! Let's go!
O-okay...
